metadata.description: Official Claude Code plugins for AgentDashboards development. Battle-tested patterns for Xano backend + Next.js frontend stack.

plugins.name: xano-sdk-builder
plugins.description: Expert XanoScript SDK development with BUILD->TEST->UPDATE->REPEAT workflow. 95%+ first-submission success patterns for endpoints, functions, and tasks.

plugins.name: xano-mcp-workflow
plugins.description: Battle-tested patterns for the Xano MCP tool. Curl testing, endpoint creation, batch migrations, error handling.

plugins.name: xano-api-development
plugins.description: High-level Xano architecture and design decisions. Workspace organization, endpoint vs function choices, auth patterns.

plugins.name: frontend-dev-guidelines
plugins.description: React/TypeScript best practices for AgentDashboards. ShadCN UI, TanStack Router, Suspense patterns, MUI v7 compatibility.

plugins.name: xano-nextjs-integration
plugins.description: Connect Xano backend to Next.js frontend. Service layer patterns, data flow, state management, type safety across boundaries.

plugins.name: debug-fix-verify
plugins.description: Systematic 7-step debug workflow. Add logs, test, analyze, fix, verify, deploy. Works for both Xano and frontend issues.

plugins.name: playwright-testing
plugins.description: Browser automation and E2E testing with Playwright MCP. Snapshots, form filling, visual testing, console error debugging.

plugins.name: xano-builder-agent
plugins.description: Autonomous Xano backend developer agent. Builds endpoints incrementally following proven patterns.
